fullplot: A tragic story of love and loneliness - this is the unknown life of the great Russian writer Ivan Bunin. The confused love story that involved Bunin, his wife Vera, the young poet Galina Plotnikova, opera singer Marga Kovtun and literary man Leonid Gurov. A work of great honesty and piercing psychology.

title: His Wife's Diary

tomatoes.consensus: Well-made but extremely predictable, Domestic Disturbance is an average thriller that may work better on TV.
